title: Daily Exercise
description: Ensure your pet gets adequate physical activity based on their breed and age. Dogs need 30 minutes to 2 hours daily, while cats benefit from 10-15 minutes of active play.

title: Fresh Water Always
description: Keep fresh, clean water available at all times. Change the water daily and clean the bowl regularly to prevent bacteria buildup.

title: Regular Grooming
description: Brush your pet regularly to prevent matting and reduce shedding. This also helps you check for any skin issues or parasites early.
